Skill Desc: Reduces impairments to mobilitywhile stuck in monster muck.
Makes monsters hit with slingerdung pods more likely to run.
Nullifies or reduces environmentaldamage in the Rotten Vale.
Increases attack power.Also improves affinity athigher levels.
Increases defense. Level upto improve resistances as well.
Increases the amount recoveredwhen restoring health.
Speeds healing of recoverabledamage (the red portion of thehealth gauge).
Increases fire resistance.Also improves defense athigher levels.
Increases water resistance.Also improves defense athigher levels.
Increases ice resistance.Also improves defense athigher levels.
Increases thunder resistance.Also improves defense athigher levels.
Increases dragon resistance.Also improves defense athigher levels.
Increases fire element attack power.(Elemental attack power hasa maximum limit.)
Increases water element attack power.(Elemental attack power hasa maximum limit.)
Increases ice element attack power.(Elemental attack power hasa maximum limit.)
Increases thunder element attack power.(Elemental attack power hasa maximum limit.)
Increases dragon element attack power.(Elemental attack power hasa maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of poison buildup.(Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of paralysis buildup.(Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of sleep buildup.(Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the rate of blast buildup.(Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Increases the attack powerof normal ammo andnormal arrows.
Increases the attack powerof piercing ammo and DragonPiercer.
Increases the attack powerof spread ammo, power shotarrows, and Thousand Dragons.
Unlocks your weapon's hidden element.Also increases bowgun loading capacity.(There is a cap to loading capacity.)
Increases the affinity of attacksthat exploit a monster weak spot.
Increases the fill rate for weaponswith gauges and the charge ratefor weapons with charge attacks.
Allows long swords, dual blades, insectglaives, switch axes, and charge bladesto stay powered up longer.
Extends the weapon sharpness gauge.However, it will not increase the gaugepast its maximum.
Makes it easier to break orsever parts of large monsters.
Makes it easier to stun monsters.
Increases certain attacks'ability to exhaust monsters.
Makes it easier to mount monsters.
Increases the damage caused byjumping attacks.
Temporarily increases affinity andreduces stamina depletion whencertain conditions are met.
Increases attack power andaffinity when large monstersbecome enraged.
Increases attack whenyour health is full.
Increases attack power and defensewhen health drops to 35% or lower.
Temporarily increases your attackand defense every time you faintup to 2 times.
Increases attack when you haverecoverable damage (the redportion of your health gauge).
Improves evasion and reducesstamina depletion when afflictedwith abnormal status effects.
Increases the effect duration ofhunting horn melodies.
Increases the gunlance'sshell capacity and chargeblade's phial capacity.
Increases the power of bowgunspecial ammo, Dragon Piercer,and Thousand Dragons.
Strengthens explosive attacks likegunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, chargeblade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.
Increases the firepower ofballistae and cannons.
Slows down stamina depletionfor actions which continuouslydrain stamina (such as dashing).
Reduces stamina depletionwhen performing stamina-drainingmoves such as evading, etc.
Allows you to do a dive-evade whenfacing towards large monsters, andextends the dive-evade distance.
Reduces maximum stamina depletion overtime. However, does not work againstcold environments that reduce stamina.
Reduces knockbacks and staminadepletion when guarding.
Allows the effects of certainitems to also affect nearby allies.
Extends the durationof some item effects.
Gives you a predeterminedchance of consuming a foodor drink item for free.
Speeds up weapon sharpeningwhen using a whetstone.
Lets you digest mushrooms thatwould otherwise be inedible andgain their advantageous effects.
Increases your speed whiletransporting items and decreasesthe likelihood of dropping them.
Allows you to gather more quickly,and also prevents attacks fromknocking you back while gathering.
Increases the quantity of honey youreceive when gathering in the field.
Has a predetermined chance ofreducing the damage you take.
Increases the quantity of herbsand other consumable items yougather.
Increases the number of timesyou can use a gathering point.
Increases affinity as long as staminais kept full for a period of time.
Increases loading capacity for slinger ammoobtained in the field. Limits the amount ofammo used when firing certain shots.
Makes it easier for monstersto lose sight of you.
Prevents knockbacks and otherreactions to small damage.
Prevents attacks from knockingyou back during a jump.
Extra health is recovered fromenvironmental interactables likeSporepuffs or Wiggly Litchi.
Lets you move more freely in water.Also prevents you from being slowed downby terrain effects, such as deep snow.
Decreases stamina depletion when evadingwhile clinging to walls or ivy, or whenmoving while grappling onto an enemy.
Improves the effectivenessof flash attacks and items.
Speeds up progress on research levelsand special investigations. (Effect isapplied at the quest results screen.)
Decreases the chances of destroyingthe bodies of small insect monsters,allowing them to be carved.
Increases your scoutflies' gaugefill rate when you find tracks andother traces left by monsters.
Increases the chance of findingrare gathering points.
Shows rare gathering points onthe Wildlife Map.
Reduces the recharge timefor specialized tools.
Sliding increases your affinityfor a short time.
Increases the Elderseal ofweapons and dragon ammo.
Reduces the chances small monsterswill attack after spotting you.(No effect on certain monsters.)
Increases max bow chargelevel by one.
Prevents attacks from being deflected.Also shortens the distance before ammoand arrows reach maximum power.
Allows you to guard againstordinarily unblockable attacks.
Weapon sharpness does notdecrease for a set time aftersharpening.
Powers up non-elementalweapons you have equipped.
Above a certain health threshold,you withstand an attack that wouldnormally cart you (once only).
Regenerates your health as youcontinually attack a monster.Recovery varies by weapon.
Halves sharpness loss. For bowsand bowguns, shots have a chancenot to expend coatings or ammo.
Increases elemental damage(fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon)when landing critical hits.
Increases abnormal status effectdamage (paralysis, poison, sleep,blast) when landing critical hits.
Increases the attention drawnwhen attacking a monster.
Temporarily increases attackpower after executinga perfectly-timed guard.
Temporarily enhances attacksafter recovering from blightsor abnormal status.
Allows you to quickly recover from heavyattacks that blow you back when youhave your weapon unsheathed.
Raises attack as your weapon losessharpness. Also boosts ranged weaponmelee attacks and odds of stunning.
Temporarily reduces staminadepletion when health is at 40%or lower.
